synopsis.text: Ministry of Health and Welfare's Overpopulation Research Laboratory, also known as the Superhuman Bureau, is tasked with the identification, supervision, and protection of superhumans in an alternate Japan. This world is not merely a hypothetical scenario but a reality where diverse superhumans coexist. From titans hailing from outer space and mystical lifeforms to ancient phantoms, goblins, and cyborgs created by scientists, these extraordinary beings have emerged from various backgrounds and possess unique abilities. Some superhumans choose to conceal their identities, while others embrace their fame and recognition. Jiro Hitoyoshi, a member of the Superhuman Bureau, is at the heart of this series, navigating the complex world of superhumans and their adversaries, who operate in the shadows. Set in a thriving Japan two decades after a war, this captivating tale unravels the intricate lives of these superhumans and the challenges they face in a rapidly evolving society.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
